code: import React from'react';import'./sidebardropdown.css';import dropdown from'../../assets/icons/dropdown.svg';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function clickMenu(id){document.getElementById(id).classList.toggle("show");}const Sidebardropdown=_ref=>{let{title,contents,tag,action}=_ref;const listItems=contents.slice(0,15).map((content,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:action+content.name,children:tag+content.name})},index));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebardropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>clickMenu(title),className:"sidebardropdown__button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:dropdown,alt:"dropdown"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"sidebardropdown__list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:title,className:"sidebardropdown__list-contents fade-in",children:listItems})})]});};export default Sidebardropdown;
